Description: This doesnt need to be bought, I already have one.
The main part of the clock, displays the time.

Part: Adafruit PCM5102 I2S DAC with Line Level Output - 112dB SNR
Description: DAC for getting audio from the Raspberry Pi.
Amplifier so that the audio is loud enough.
The speaker that will be connected through 2 other boards. I actually only need one of these, in my AliExpress cart it will say 2 but I only need 1 sorry.
Buttons for interfacing with the clock.
Wire for connecting the various components.
